title: BRIT Awards 2017: Watch David Bowie’s Award Accepted by Michael C. Hall
text:
BRIT Awards 2017: Watch David Bowie’s Award Accepted by Michael C. Hall “If David Bowie could be here tonight, he probably wouldn’t be here tonight” David Bowie Photo by Kevin Mazur/WireImage 
David Bowie won Best British Male Solo Artist at tonight’s BRIT Awards . Accepting the award on his behalf was Michael C. Hall, who starred in Bowie’s Lazarus musical . He began the speech, “If David Bowie could be here tonight, he probably wouldn’t be here tonight.” Watch the full thing below. See the full list of BRIT winners here . 
Bowie’s posthumous honor at the BRITs follows his various Grammy Awards. He won all five awards for which he was nominated, including Best Rock Song for Blackstar ’s title track . The victories marked the first time he received musical awards at the ceremony.
